oshiSkill.name: Koyori Experiment
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] The arts of one of your holomem named Hakui Koyori which has a card with #KoyoLabo attached gain +30 power until the end of this turn.

spOshiSkill.name: Assisant-kun, mwah!
spOshiSkill.description: [Once Per Game] Usable if your holomem named Hakui Koyori with a Koyori's Assistant-kun attached is about to take damage during your opponent's turn: Reduce that damage by 100.

oshiSkill.name: The elegant one of ReGLOSS
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] Send 1 cheer from your archive to one of your holomem with #ReGLOSS.

spOshiSkill.name: Spinning around in my spare time
spOshiSkill.description: [Once Per Game] Return 1-4 Events with #Mushroom from your archive to hand. Then, for each 2 cards returned to your hand, draw 1 card.

oshiSkill.name: Reach the top!
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] If your center holomem has #ReGLOSS, deal 50 special damage to your opponent's collab holomem.

spOshiSkill.name: Kawaii! Positive! Genius!
spOshiSkill.description: [Once Per Game] Usable if your holomem named Ichijou Ririka is downed during your opponent's turn: reveal 1 Ichijou Ririka and 1 Struggle Meal from your deck and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

oshiSkill.name: Love you
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] Usable if your holomem is downed during your opponent's turn: Return 1 Fan attached to that holomem to hand.

spOshiSkill.name: Vrooooom! Baribaribaribari
spOshiSkill.description: [Once Per Game] Choose one of your holomem named Yukihana Lamy. Until the end of this turn, whenever that holomem deals special damage to a single opposing holomem, that damage is increased by +100. When the chosen holomem downs one of your opponent's holomem during this turn, draw 2 cards.

oshiSkill.name: Leader's work
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] During this turn, whenever you roll a dice 3 times as part of an ability or arts, treat all dice rolls as if the result was 5.

spOshiSkill.name: We are Secret Society holoX!
spOshiSkill.description: [Once Per Game] The arts of one of your holomem with #SecretSocietyholoX can be used without fulfilling their cheer requirement until the end of this turn.

oshiSkill.name: Mental! Physical! Passion!
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] Usable if your holomem named Oozora Subaru is about to take damage during your opponent's turn: Reduce the damage taken by all of your holomem named Oozora Subaru from that effect by 30.

spOshiSkill.name: Reaction Arts
spOshiSkill.description: [Once Per Game] Usable if you have 3 or less Life: If your center holomem is Oozora Subaru, that holomem's arts gain +100 power until the end of this turn.

oshiSkill.name: Mystical Ritual
oshiSkill.description: [Once Per Turn] Reveal 1 Ancient Weapon from your deck and attach it to any of your holomem. Then shuffle your deck.

spOshiSkill.name: Those who think about life will win
spOshiSkill.description: [Once Per Game] Send 1 cheer from your archive to each of your holomem that have an Ancient Weapon attached.

spOshiSkill.name: Hakui Koyori
spOshiSkill.extraEffect: You may put any number of copies of this holomem in your deck.

skills.name: Oh, you poor souls lost within an eternal cycle
skills.description: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. From among them, you may reveal a Debut holomem with #SecretSocietyholoX or a Support card with #KoyoLabo and put the revealed card into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

skills.name: Assistant-kun, watch out!
skills.description: You may attach a Koyori's Assistant-kun from your archive to one of your other holomem named Hakui Koyori.

spOshiSkill.name: Hakui Koyori
spOshiSkill.bloomEffect: Hai! Hai! Hai! Hai! : Reveal 1 Support card with #KoyoLabo from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

skills.name: Assistant-kun and Koyo will always be together!
skills.description: If this holomem has a Koyori's Assistant-kun attached, draw 1 card.

spOshiSkill.name: Hakui Koyori
spOshiSkill.giftEffect: Never give up! : When this holomem downs an opponent's holomem, put the top card of your deck into your holo Power. Then look at your holo Power cards, reveal 1, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your holo Power.

skills.name: Life of Koyori
skills.description: If this holomem has a Support card with #KoyoLabo attached, reveal 1 Support card with #KoyoLabo from your deck and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

Reveal up to one holomem and up to one Tool, Mascot, or Fan from among them and put them into your hand. Then put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

spOshiSkill.name: Green Test Tube
spOshiSkill.ability: The arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power. If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or later Hakui Koyori, it gains the following effect: During your Main Step, you may archive 1 Cheer from the holomem with this Tool attached to unrest one of your resting holomem with #SecretSocietyholoX. You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

spOshiSkill.name: Blacksmith's Hammer

spOshiSkill.ability: If the holomem with this Tool attached is downed during your opponent's turn, you may archive 1 card from your hand for the following effect: Put this card into your hand. If this is attached to a 1st Bloom or higher Anya Melfissa, it gains the following effect: For each Ancient Weapon attached to holomems on your stage, the arts of the holomem with this Tool attached gain +10 power. You may only attach 1 Tool to a holomem.

spOshiSkill.name: Subarudo Duck
spOshiSkill.ability: The holomem with this Mascot attached has +20 HP. If this is attached to Oozora Subaru, it gains the following effect: If there is a total of 10 or more cheers in play between both players, the arts of holomem with this Mascot attached gain +20 power. You may only attach 1 Mascot to a holomem.

spOshiSkill.name: Koyori's Assistant-kun
spOshiSkill.ability: When you attach this Fan to one of your holomem from hand or from archive, you may move 1 cheer on your stage to the holomem this Fan was attached to. This Fan may only be attached to your Hakui Koyori, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.

spOshiSkill.name: Yukimin
spOshiSkill.ability: Special damage done by the holomem with this Fan attached to your opponent's center holomem is increased by +10. This Fan may only be attached to your Yukihana Lamy, and you may attach any number of this Fan to one holomem.
